Geger Mobil Terbang Hantam Emak-emak Jogging
05 Nov 2019, 07:53 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Salah injak pedal gas bikin celaka di Harbour Bay, Batam, Kepulauan Riau (Kepri). Seorang ibu, A Tju (51) yang sedang jogging ikut dihantam mobil 'terbang' setelah melaju kencang menabrak pemisah jalan.
Kecelakaan ini terjadi pada sekitar pukul 05.30 WIB, Sabtu (2/11), di kompleks Harbour Bay, Batam. Saat itu FV mengemudikan mobil warna hitam bernomor polisi BP-1916-AM.
Setelah menginjak gas, mobil yang dikemudikan FV melompat ke seberang jalan karena menghantam pembatas jalan. Mobil ini berhenti setelah kembali menabrak pembatas jalan di sisi kanan korban.
"Pengemudi salah injek rem, malah diinjak gas akhirnya out of control. Mobilnya loncat menabrak pembatas jalan dan menabrak pejalan kaki yang saat itu berolahraga pagi, jogging," ujar Kabid Humas Polda Kepri Kombes S Erlangga, Senin (4/11/2019).

The shock of the Flying Car Hit Mother's Jogging
05 Nov 2019, 07:53 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - One step on the gas pedal wreaks havoc in Harbor Bay, Batam, Riau Islands (Riau Islands). A mother, A Tju (51) who was jogging, was hit by a 'flying' car after speeding into a road separator.
This accident occurred at around 05.30 WIB, Saturday (2/11), in the Harbor Bay complex, Batam. At that time the FV was driving a black car with police number BP-1916-AM.
After stepping on the gas, the car driven by the FV jumped across the road because it hit the road divider. This car stopped after returning to hit the road divider on the right side of the victim.
"The driver hit the wrong brake, even stepped on the gas finally out of control. His car jumped into the road divider and hit pedestrians who were exercising early in the morning, jogging," said Head of Public Relations of the Riau Islands Police Commissioner S Erlangga, Monday (11/04/2019).
